svg.text: 📊 Global Cost: Cybercrime causes over $6 trillion in annual damages worldwide
⚡ Attack Frequency: A cyberattack occurs every 39 seconds on average
🔒 Ransomware: 95% of successful cyber attacks are due to human error
📱 Mobile Threats: 50% increase in mobile malware attacks year-over-year
🌐 IoT Vulnerabilities: 75 billion connected devices by 2025
🎯 Targeted Attacks: 43% of cyberattacks target small businesses
